list, head, print, tail

Source: R/dprint.R
dprint.Rd

listing for data frames

Usage

dprint(data, y = NULL, n = 0, ..., x = NULL)

Arguments

data

if x is formula or names for data frame then data frame is needed.

y

name of variable, or fomula, or names of variables on data frame.

n

Index of observations to print (default c(1:nfirst, n-nlast:nlast)

...

Optional additional arguments (nfirst,nlast, and print options)

x

possible group variable

Author

Klaus K. Holst and Thomas Scheike

Examples

m <- lava::lvm(letters)
d <- lava::sim(m, 20)

dlist(d,~a+b+c)
#>     a        b       c        
#> 1   -0.57713  1.3864  0.2035  
#> 2   -0.80592 -1.3047  0.8770  
#> 3    1.22148  0.8083 -0.8739  
#> 4    0.03472  0.1451 -0.2107  
#> 5   -2.55785  0.8355  0.5970  
#> ---                           
#> 16   1.0592   0.1010 -0.004013
#> 17   1.0293  -0.1649  0.582503
#> 18  -0.3133  -0.7004  0.170292
#> 19  -0.9958   1.8680  0.055593
#> 20  -0.6279  -0.5425  1.141641
dlist(d,~a+b+c|a<0 & b>0)
#>    a       b       c       
#> 1  -0.5771 1.38640  0.20349
#> 5  -2.5578 0.83551  0.59703
#> 7  -1.4403 1.84722 -1.36392
#> 12 -0.6864 0.34647  1.12117
#> 13 -0.4690 0.03698  0.21409
#> 14 -0.8690 0.24112  0.85016
#> 19 -0.9958 1.86798  0.05559
## listing all : 
dlist(d,~a+b+c|a<0 & b>0,n=0)
#>             a          b           c
#> 1  -0.5771254 1.38639858  0.20349331
#> 5  -2.5578479 0.83551163  0.59702674
#> 7  -1.4402667 1.84721571 -1.36391844
#> 12 -0.6863567 0.34647417  1.12117388
#> 13 -0.4689727 0.03698312  0.21408719
#> 14 -0.8689645 0.24111853  0.85016454
#> 19 -0.9958388 1.86798026  0.05559288
dlist(d,a+b+c~I(d>0)|a<0 & b>0)
#> I(d > 0): FALSE
#>   a     b     c     
#> 7 -1.44 1.847 -1.364
#> ------------------------------------------------------------ 
#> I(d > 0): TRUE
#>    a       b       c      
#> 1  -0.5771 1.38640 0.20349
#> 5  -2.5578 0.83551 0.59703

#> 13 -0.4690 0.03698 0.21409
#> 14 -0.8690 0.24112 0.85016
#> 19 -0.9958 1.86798 0.05559
dlist(d,.~I(d>0)|a<0 & b>0)

dlist(d,~a+b+c|a<0 & b>0, nlast=0)
#>    a       b       c      
#> 1  -0.5771 1.38640  0.2035
#> 5  -2.5578 0.83551  0.5970
#> 7  -1.4403 1.84722 -1.3639
#> 12 -0.6864 0.34647  1.1212
#> 13 -0.4690 0.03698  0.2141
dlist(d,~a+b+c|a<0 & b>0, nfirst=3, nlast=3)
#>     a       b       c      
#> 1   -0.5771 1.3864   0.2035
#> 5   -2.5578 0.8355   0.5970
#> 7   -1.4403 1.8472  -1.3639

#> 13  -0.4690 0.03698 0.21409

#> 12 -0.6864 0.34647  1.12117

dlist(d,~a+b+c|a<0 & b>0, list(1:5,50:55,-(5:1)))
#>     a       b       c       
#> 1   -0.5771 1.38640  0.2035 
#> 5   -2.5578 0.83551  0.5970 
#> 7   -1.4403 1.84722 -1.3639 
#> 12  -0.6864 0.34647  1.1212

#> ---

#> 12  -0.6864 0.34647  1.12117
#> 13  -0.4690 0.03698  0.21409
#> 14  -0.8690 0.24112  0.85016
#> 19  -0.9958 1.86798  0.05559
dprint(d,a+b+c ~ I(d>0) |a<0 & b>0, list(1:5,50:55,-(5:1)))
